rooms.description: Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows offering natural light and Vastu compliant north-east corner placement for auspicious energy. Incorporates large window seating for relaxation.
Modern dining space adjacent to the living room, featuring a semi-open plan layout with natural light from east-facing window. Designed for family meals.
Fully equipped kitchen designed for a family of four with an island counter. Vastu compliant placement in the southeast zone.
Master bedroom with a private balcony, floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring ample daylight. Placed in the north zone to adhere to Vastu principles.
Guest/child bedroom with natural ventilation and south-west orientation. Incorporates storage solutions for a family of four.
Dedicated home theater room with soundproofing and ambient lighting. Designed to provide a cinematic experience.
Study area for remote work and hobbies, with east-facing window ensuring a bright atmosphere.

openings.description: North-facing main entrance with ample space for guests and a welcoming pathway.
Two-car garage entrance integrated into the design with efficient access.

utilities.description: Though single-story, a service staircase is provided for future vertical expansion if required.

miscellaneous.design_principles: Residential and commercial design with emphasis on natural light, Vastu compliant layout, and integrated open spaces.
